    Extbase\Error

    Class Tx_Extbase_Error_Error

    public class Tx_Extbase_Error_Error

    An object representation of a generic error. Subclass this to create more specific errors if necessary.

    Subpackage: Error

    Constructs this error

    Parameters

    $message - An english error message which is used if no other error message can be resolved
    $code - A unique error code
